Description:
Detects relevant commands often related to malware or hacking activity

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious Commands Linux
Query: sourcetype='linux-auditd' eql select * from _source_ where ((type = 'execve' and a0 = 'chmod' and a1 = 'u+s') or (type = 'execve' and a0 = 'cp' and a1 = '/bin/ksh') or (type = 'execve' and a0 = 'cp' and a1 = '/bin/sh') or (type = 'execve' and a0 = 'chmod' and a1 = '777'))
